item.title: Intel LASS Feature Looks Like It Will Be Upstreamed For Linux 6.19

item.title: Blender 5.0 released

item.title: Vulkan SER Showing Up To ~47% Performance Improvement For Ray-Tracing
item.description: Last week's Vulkan 1.4.333 brought a new ray-tracing extension with VK_EXT_ray_tracing_invocation_reorder that was derived from a prior NVIDIA vendor extension (VK_NV_ray_tracing_invocation_reorder). This new extension for Shader Execution Reordering "SER" is showing to deliver some nice performance potential for Vulkan ray-tracing performance...
